conversion_verification.notes: The 2D plan has been successfully converted into a true isometric cutaway model with distinct wall geometry.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D projection. Walls have consistent height and clear thickness. The plan is accurately transformed into a volume.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High fidelity in room adjacencies and wall placement. Balcony/deck perimeter matches the 2D zig-zag geometry well. Some minor scaling variations in smaller utility sections.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement corresponds well to the plan (beds, dining table, kitchen island). Bathroom fixtures are represented by generic geometric proxies.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering. No text contamination. Lighting is soft but provides enough contrast to distinguish spaces.

detected_errors.description: Some window openings on the exterior walls lack the specific frame detail shown in the 2D plan.
Simplified geometry for bathroom fixtures compared to detailed 2D icons.

summary: A highly accurate and clean 3D isometric conversion that maintains strict geometric fidelity to the original floor plan layout.
